thread.title: Our new "home" in NYC
thread.title_full: Our new "home" in NYC - Review of Arlo NoMad, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: blandkiser
title: Our new "home" in NYC
text: As someone who has been traveling to NYC my whole life, my wife and I escaped to our favorite city for a weekend getaway March 3-5 and stayed in a queen room at this AWESOME new hotel. The staff was super friendly, the room was clean /luxurious / efficient. The bars and restaurants were great too as was our view of the city. The Korean Deli on the corner is a huge amenity for the hotel too with everything you could imagine and we'll look forward to returning to our new favorite hotel in NYC very soon. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
